mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_num, user_id, nickname, pwd, name, sex, info_year, info_mon, info_day, info_hh, info_mm) values(user_num_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{nickname}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{info_year}, #{info_mon}, #{info_day}, #{info_hh}, #{info_mm})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_info where user_id=#{id}
